trans-unit.source: About Windows PowerShell
trans-unit.target: About Windows PowerShell

trans-unit.source: powershell,cmdlet
trans-unit.target: powershell,cmdlet

trans-unit.source: About Windows PowerShell
trans-unit.target: About Windows PowerShell

trans-unit.source: Windows PowerShell is designed to improve the command-line and scripting environment by eliminating long-standing problems and adding new features.
trans-unit.target: Windows PowerShell is designed to improve the command-line and scripting environment by eliminating long-standing problems and adding new features.

trans-unit.source: Discoverability
trans-unit.target: Discoverability

trans-unit.source: Windows PowerShell makes it easy to discover its features.
trans-unit.target: Windows PowerShell makes it easy to discover its features.

trans-unit.source: For example, to find a list of cmdlets that view and change Windows services, type:
trans-unit.target: For example, to find a list of cmdlets that view and change Windows services, type:

trans-unit.source: After discovering which cmdlet accomplishes a task, you can learn more about the cmdlet by using the Get-Help cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: After discovering which cmdlet accomplishes a task, you can learn more about the cmdlet by using the Get-Help cmdlet.

trans-unit.source: For example, to display help about the Get-Service cmdlet, type:
trans-unit.target: For example, to display help about the Get-Service cmdlet, type:

trans-unit.source: Most cmdlets emit objects which can be manipulated and then rendered into text for display.
trans-unit.target: Most cmdlets emit objects which can be manipulated and then rendered into text for display.

trans-unit.source: To fully understand the output of that cmdlet, pipe its output to the Get-Member cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: To fully understand the output of that cmdlet, pipe its output to the Get-Member cmdlet.

trans-unit.source: For example, the following command displays information about the members of the object output by the Get-Service cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: For example, the following command displays information about the members of the object output by the Get-Service cmdlet.

trans-unit.source: Consistency
trans-unit.target: Consistency

trans-unit.source: Managing systems can be a complex endeavor and tools that have a consistent interface help to control the inherent complexity.
trans-unit.target: Managing systems can be a complex endeavor and tools that have a consistent interface help to control the inherent complexity.

trans-unit.source: Unfortunately, neither command-line tools nor scriptable COM objects have been known for their consistency.
trans-unit.target: Unfortunately, neither command-line tools nor scriptable COM objects have been known for their consistency.

trans-unit.source: The consistency of Windows PowerShell is one of its primary assets.
trans-unit.target: The consistency of Windows PowerShell is one of its primary assets.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you learn how to use the Sort-Object cmdlet, you can use that knowledge to sort the output of any cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: For example, if you learn how to use the Sort-Object cmdlet, you can use that knowledge to sort the output of any cmdlet.

trans-unit.source: You do not have to learn the different sorting routines of each cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: You do not have to learn the different sorting routines of each cmdlet.

trans-unit.source: In addition, cmdlet developers do not have to design sorting features for their cmdlets.
trans-unit.target: In addition, cmdlet developers do not have to design sorting features for their cmdlets.

trans-unit.source: Windows PowerShell gives them a framework that provides the basic features and forces them to be consistent about many aspects of the interface.
trans-unit.target: Windows PowerShell gives them a framework that provides the basic features and forces them to be consistent about many aspects of the interface.

trans-unit.source: The framework eliminates some of the choices that are typically left to the developer, but, in return, it makes the development of robust and easy-to-use cmdlets much simpler.
trans-unit.target: The framework eliminates some of the choices that are typically left to the developer, but, in return, it makes the development of robust and easy-to-use cmdlets much simpler.

trans-unit.source: Interactive and Scripting Environments
trans-unit.target: Interactive and Scripting Environments

trans-unit.source: Windows PowerShell is a combined interactive and scripting environment that gives you access to command-line tools and COM objects, and also enables you to use the power of the .NET Framework Class Library (FCL).
trans-unit.target: Windows PowerShell is a combined interactive and scripting environment that gives you access to command-line tools and COM objects, and also enables you to use the power of the .NET Framework Class Library (FCL).

trans-unit.source: This environment improves upon the Windows Command Prompt, which provides an interactive environment with multiple command-line tools.
trans-unit.target: This environment improves upon the Windows Command Prompt, which provides an interactive environment with multiple command-line tools.

trans-unit.source: It also improves upon Windows Script Host (WSH) scripts, which let you use multiple command-line tools and COM automation objects, but do not provide an interactive environment.
trans-unit.target: It also improves upon Windows Script Host (WSH) scripts, which let you use multiple command-line tools and COM automation objects, but do not provide an interactive environment.

trans-unit.source: By combining access to all of these features, Windows PowerShell extends the ability of the interactive user and the script writer, and makes system administration more manageable.
trans-unit.target: By combining access to all of these features, Windows PowerShell extends the ability of the interactive user and the script writer, and makes system administration more manageable.

trans-unit.source: Object Orientation
trans-unit.target: Object Orientation

trans-unit.source: Although you interact with Windows PowerShell by typing commands in text, Windows PowerShell is based on objects, not text.
trans-unit.target: Although you interact with Windows PowerShell by typing commands in text, Windows PowerShell is based on objects, not text.

trans-unit.source: The output of a command is an object.
trans-unit.target: The output of a command is an object.

trans-unit.source: You can send the output object to another command as its input.
trans-unit.target: You can send the output object to another command as its input.

trans-unit.source: As a result, Windows PowerShell provides a familiar interface to people experienced with other shells, while introducing a new and powerful command-line paradigm.
trans-unit.target: As a result, Windows PowerShell provides a familiar interface to people experienced with other shells, while introducing a new and powerful command-line paradigm.

trans-unit.source: It extends the concept of sending data between commands by enabling you to send objects, rather than text.
trans-unit.target: It extends the concept of sending data between commands by enabling you to send objects, rather than text.

trans-unit.source: Easy Transition to Scripting
trans-unit.target: Easy Transition to Scripting

trans-unit.source: Windows PowerShell makes it easy to transition from typing commands interactively to creating and running scripts.
trans-unit.target: Windows PowerShell makes it easy to transition from typing commands interactively to creating and running scripts.

trans-unit.source: You can type commands at the Windows PowerShell command prompt to discover the commands that perform a task.
trans-unit.target: You can type commands at the Windows PowerShell command prompt to discover the commands that perform a task.

trans-unit.source: Then, you can save those commands in a transcript or a history before copying them to a file for use as a script.
trans-unit.target: Then, you can save those commands in a transcript or a history before copying them to a file for use as a script.
